parameters.content:
# üéØ 30-Minute Workshop Flow

## Timing:
- **0-5 min**: Introduction & Demo
- **5-15 min**: Explanation of each node
- **15-25 min**: Hands-on (modify RSS feed)
- **25-30 min**: Q&A & Tips

## Workshop Steps:
1. Start with Manual Trigger
2. RSS Feed reads news
3. AI summarizes
4. Output to Slack/Email

nodes.name: Tech News RSS
nodes.notesInFlow: Participants can change this URL to their favorite tech blog

nodes.name: Top 5 Articles
nodes.notesInFlow: Limited to 5 articles for fast processing

parameters.text:
=You are a tech news expert who creates beautiful markdown summaries. Analyze these 5 news articles:

{{ $json.data.map((item, index) => `${index + 1}. **${item.title}**\n${item.contentSnippet || item.description}\nURL: ${item.link}\n`).join('\n') }}

Create a structured summary in markdown format:

### üéØ Top 3 Main Topics

For each main topic provide:
- A clear **title** with emoji
- A brief explanation (max 2 sentences)
- Include the actual article link(s) as markdown links: [Article Title](URL)

### üí° Key Insights

Mention 2-3 important trends or developments you see.
Include links to relevant articles.

### üöÄ Tech Tip of the Day

Provide a practical tip based on the news.

### üìå One-liners

Give 3 short bullet points with other interesting news.
Include links where relevant.

IMPORTANT: Always include actual article URLs as clickable markdown links throughout your summary. Use format: [Title](URL)

Use markdown formatting like **bold**, *italic*, `code`, and > quotes where relevant. Keep it concise but informative.

assignments.name: daily_summary
assignments.value:
=# üöÄ CINQ Tech News Digest

---

- **Sources:** The Hacker News
- **AI Model:** Ollama Gemma3n

---

### üîó Links

*ü§ñ Automatically generated by CINQ n8n Workshop*

parameters.content:
## üéâ Output Options

Choose one of these outputs:
1. **Email**: Send to yourself
2. **Slack**: Post in channel
3. **Webhook**: To your own app
4. **File**: Save as Markdown

For the workshop we use the Response node to see the result directly!

## üìù Hands-on Assignments

**Assignment 1 (5 min):**
Change the RSS feed to:
- https://techcrunch.com/feed/
- https://feeds.arstechnica.com/arstechnica/index
- Or your own favorite tech blog!

**Assignment 2 (5 min):**
Customize the AI prompt:
- Ask for a summary in another language
- Focus on security news
- Make it more formal/informal

**Assignment 3 (5 min):**
Add a filter:
- Only today's articles
- Only with certain keywords
- Sort by relevance

## ‚ö° Quick Tips

1. **Test quickly**: Use Manual Trigger
2. **Debug**: Click on nodes for output
3. **AI Costs**: GPT-3.5 is cheaper
4. **Error handling**: Add try-catch
5. **Scheduling**: Upgrade to cron
6. **Ollama Chat Model**: http://host.docker.internal:11434

## üîó Useful Links
- n8n Docs: docs.n8n.io
- RSS Feeds: github.com/plenaryapp/awesome-rss-feeds
- Workshop Repo: [your-github-link]
